2010-07-18

30 Days of Buffy: Day 13: Favourite Potential

As potentials go from forgettable to annoying it's not too tough to choose a favourite... I was tempted to pick Vi because... you know... it's Felicia Day and that's almost reason enough... but not quite. My choice is Amanda, for her lovely long face and for "that's what I did. I stuck up for myself. The other day after class, I jumped him in the parking lot, and I slammed his stupid-ass insecure face right into the pavement!"
